title: sujonali1819
author: sujonali1819
content: We are looking for a copywriter with a high level of English (native) and knowledge of the crypto industry. So if you are a Native English speaker, have good knowledge about crypto and if you have experience as a copywriter you can show your portfolio below or sending Pm me here or via telegram @sujonali1819, Don't forget to mention your bitcointalk id if you do Telegram pm. RegardsSujonali1819

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Still looking. Sent me your portfolio. Long-term project.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Hi sujonali, I've been writing for Coinbench in the past for copywriting articles and blockchain company descriptions. I also have some translation experience that you can look at here[1]. Recently I've been writing on my Steemit blog (copywriting news to articles)[2]. I'm not a native speaker but I believe I have a decent level of written English.[1] https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aEjUu8RmlSr6xjZDnF5U8il8tfGccaAfUAndsWy2R38/edit#gid=920539303[2] https://steemit.com/@littlejohn16

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on September 13, 2022, 01:33:34 PMHi sujonali, I've been writing for Coinbench in the past for copywriting articles and blockchain company descriptions. I also have some translation experience that you can look at here[1]. Recently I've been writing on my Steemit blog (copywriting news to articles)[2]. I have already forwarded the info to the team. I will let you know if you have a green signal.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Someone already selected and notified. For now, I'm locking this thread.
